data.title: Stiefel Plans $640M Acquisition Of Dermatology Firm Connetics
data.meta_description: Privately held Stiefel Laboratories Inc.'s acquisition of Connetics Corp. for $640 million represents a happy ending - or beginning - for the firm previously known as Connective Therapeutics Inc. (BioWorld Today)
